title: What are your thoughts on Sun consciousness? - Quora

response.answer_text: The sun is not a huge hydrogen bomb. It is not nuclear explosions which drives the sun. Who claims this oversimplify a complex construct of electrodynamics and plasma. Nuclear fusion is inside the sun “just a byproduct”. The real process is electrical in its nature and not yet fully understood.The sun recycles most of its own material.Instead of burning all of its “fuel”, the sun seems to collect energy from huge “electric rivers”. It seems to work as a collector (or capacitor) of energy instead of just a battery that consumes its energy.Solar bursts seems not to be random. The burst is electrodynamic. Watch how it looks when a solar flare comes out of the sun. The exit points opens and close accordingly, like a rocket engine controls its own output and vector. Rupert Sheldrake has made a good point: if the sun is able to control its trajectory by controlled solar flares, this invalidates the dark matter hypothesis.There is a untold war going on between materialism (consciousness is only a epiphenomena and free will an illusion) and idealism (consciousness as foundation of physical reality). This shapes cosmology and makes it the playground for the worldview games. Every paradigm is based on cosmology, what we can observe and predict. Despite their many fails materialism is still mainstream, but it lose territory every day. Theories like that of Sheldrake are indeed more inclined towards idealism, but he miss the point of idealism and base instead his theories on pantheism. Personally I prefer Bernardo Kastrup’s explanations of pure idealism, though Sheldrake seems to have understood some of the nonlocal and immaterial mechanisms and his morphic resonance theory is based on the “similar principle” (see also homeopathy and memory of water).I don’t believe the Sun has a “real consciousness”. It is only a construct inside the collective consciousness, representing a physical counterpart of something bigger. God is still the one consciousness which is bigger than even heavenly heavens. He knows every star by name.Economics and politics shape scientific paradigms. Once global economy is collapsed, real science will get a updraft.
